General.Name: Bangkok Land Public Company Limited
General.Description: Bangkok Land Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the real estate development, exhibition and convention, food and beverage, education, and hotel investment businesses in Thailand. The company also provides financing, project management, and building maintenance services; and real estate investment trust services. In addition, it acts as a REIT manager; and rents properties. The company was founded in 1973 and is based in Nonthaburi, Thailand.
